Plato tested a BTC Honda Civic at Donington Park last month and has now joined the squad to race alongside Josh Cook and Jade Edwards.

articles.title: The 7 Barcelona players out on loan in 2021-22 - & how they're faring - Planet Football
articles.description: Barcelona use the loan market to ship out unwanted players and find game time for squad members with limited first-team chances. They have seven out on loan in the 2021-22 season. We've had a look at how they're getting on.
articles.content: Barcelona have created a reputation for producing some of the best young players in the world, but unlike some other big European clubs, they usually prefer to let them develop in the Barcelona B tea… [+6037 chars]
